Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.Versioning.ObsoletedOSPlatform("android31.0", "This class is obsoleted in this android platform")]
[<System.Runtime.Versioning.ObsoletedOSPlatform("android31.0", "This class is obsoleted in this android platform")>]

Docs.summary: The parent class for all executable scripts.

remarks.para: The parent class for all executable scripts. This should not be used by applications.
This member is deprecated. Renderscript has been deprecated in API level 31. Please refer to the migration guide for the proposed alternatives.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
